sentence.Network_en: I paced and down on the crossroad, seeing my shadow walking solitarily!
sentence.Network_cn: 我徘徊在十字街口, 看着影子孤独的行走!

sentence.Network_en: A hermit chooses to live solitarily.
sentence.Network_cn: 隐士选择独自一人生活.

sentence.Network_en: Wave - taming Hill It thrusts solitarily from the ground, with an elevation of 213 meters.
sentence.Network_cn: 伏波山它孤峰突起, 海拔213米,半枕陆地,半插漓江.

PerfectNetExp.abs: confinement中文 ... 和磁约束(  magnetic confinement ) solitarily 独自一人地 solitary gland 淋巴孤结.
寂寞的名词和形容词是什么？_百度知道 ... 孤独,寂寞;人迹罕至 loneliness 寂寞地 solitarily 空虚感; 寂寞的心情 void.
若说一个人独处（solitarily），并不意味着这个人就感到寂寞或伶仃。 alone 一词也同义，如I live alone but I don’t feel lonely.）当然，.

auth_sentence.content: They live solitarily or in pairs, while a "drove" is the collective noun for a group of hares.
